import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function RegisterPage() { const [input, setInputs] = useState({ username:"", email:"", password:"", }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [error,SetError] = useState(null); const handlechange = (e) => { setInputs() }; useEffect(() => { document.title = "ForendonBlog | Giriş" window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []) return (
